author: Jan
review: I can hardly imagine my daily life without all the many useful features by now.

author: Paul
review: I can truly recommend the app to anyone who is an enthusiastic VanMoof rider and wants to give their daily life that extra 'on-top'.

author: Axel
review: GoMoof has given my VanMoof S5 cool new features like manual shifting and enhanced ride tracking and is absolutely recommendable.

author: Lasse
review: GoMoof makes my daily life easier with Auto Speed Limit, automatic unlocking, and charge reminders and I canâ€™t imagine life without it.
